ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger really that good?
ygData.msgSnippet: with all of this conversation about how cool a weapon is and how its unfiar that paladins have a huge sword the best weapon on EQ everyone is forgetting....
ygData.messageBody:
with all of this conversation about how cool a weapon is and how its unfiar
that paladins have a huge sword "the best weapon" on EQ everyone is
forgetting.... there are a million other quests...there are a million other
items... I've heard there are still things that people have not found yet as
well as brand new things that are added every week. Just have fun wit the
world...explore find new things dont worry if only paladins can get the
fiery avenger that just means i can devote my tyime to another quest its no
big deal...

Dillgaar, Grohl
Bertoxxulous

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim West [mailto:twest@...]
Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 2:38 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Fiery Avenger really that good?


From: "Tim West" <twest@...>



My Paladin only misses once out of every eight tries. You also have to
take into account that we can buff ourselves pretty well stacking our
spirit armor, bravery, and guard spells to take our AC beyond that of a
warrior or monk and Symbal of Tranzil to add 250 more hit points by itself.

I think Verant has done a pretty good job in making the classes pretty
comparable.
